output_text: {"id":"audit-spec-plan-001","steps":[{"name":"Scope and structure review","ok":true,"reason":"Identify document purpose, audience, and boundaries; map sections; confirm that all required components (requirements, assumptions, constraints, interfaces, acceptance criteria) are present and clearly labeled."},{"name":"Content quality and consistency check","ok":true,"reason":"Evaluate clarity, completeness, and testability of each requirement; check for ambiguities, contradictions, missing edge cases, and alignment with referenced standards or upstream documents."},{"name":"Traceability and validation readiness","ok":true,"reason":"Ensure each requirement is uniquely identifiable, traceable to business goals and stakeholders, and mappable to test cases or verification methods; log findings and prioritize issues for remediation."}],"final":"Use these three steps—scope/structure review, content quality check, and traceability/validation assessment—to systematically audit the spec and produce a prioritized list of issues to address."}
